title: Freezing screen, please help.
body:
Mid-game, my screen randomly freezes. Never out of game, I didn't check my internet yet but I would like some options before I do.

Is this a bug? Can I fix it?

The game freezed for a solid 20 seconds, 2 minutes max. During that time I unable to exit (ctrl, esc.) type, play, you name it. Maybe a problem with my laptop? 

What I'm wondering is,
Is this happening to other people?
Is this a bug in my game?
Is it just my computer?
What can I do to fix it?

Thanks.{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body:
My first thought is that it might be your whole pc freezing up momentarily from how you described it. If so, there might be some programs running in the background slowing everything down, in which case I'd try closing some of the extra stuff out to see if that helps at all.

If it's *just* league freezing up like that, run a quick repair and then also check out the steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well. Those steps covers the basics for fps/video related issues, so it should be able to help some!
